original_text: So we want you to give us seven of his male descendants. Then we will kill them. We will hang their bodies at the place where people worship the Lord in Gibeah. That was Saul's town, the man that the Lord had chosen to be king.’
korean_text: 자손 일곱 사람을 우리에게 내주소서 여호와께서 택하신 사울의 고을 기브아에서 우리가 그들을 여호와 앞에서 목 매어 달겠나이다 하니 왕이 이르되 내가 내주리라 하니라

sentences.original_text: So we want you to give us seven of his male descendants.
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 우리는 그의 남자 후송 일곱 명을 우리에게 주기를 원합니다.

sentences.original_text: at the place where people worship the Lord in Gibeah.
the man that the Lord had chosen to be king.
